Link Class

Defined in: src/link.js:4

A link connects two freedom hubs. This is an abstract class providing common functionality of translating control channels, and integrating config information.

Constructor

Link

()

Defined in src/link.js:4

    Method to call with errors.

onMessage

(
  • flow
  • message
)

Defined in src/link.js:23

Receive messages from the hub to this port. Manages startup, and passes others to 'deliverMessage' implemented in derived classes.

Parameters:

  • flow String

    the channel/flow of the message.

  • message Object

    The Message.
